title: Clubs bug need help!
body:
Hi there, 
since the new client I was kicked out of my club TOOTA and i was the leader of the clan so now we can't add anyone because noone is the leader. Could you make gutts or babeeplz the leader so we can add someone. Thanks

replies.body: Unfortunately, I wasn't able to locate this club.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and find what's going on.  Be sure to provide any additional information in your ticket, including the exact name and tag of that club, or any other members within it.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
